name: generator-jhipster-swagger2markup
description: JHipster module to create nice looking static api docs with swagger2markup
author: Frederik Hahne <atomfrede@gmail.com> (http://atomfrede.github.com/shiny-adventure/)

scripts.release: npm run lint && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
